availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Sally N. Nailor. Father of Simeon Nailor, Catharine Nailor, and Becca A. Nailor. Farmer in Garrard County in 1850. Farmer in Garrard County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, District 1, p. 75B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Garrard, p. 62.
Find A Grave, "John Nailor (May 11, 1826-August 22, 1905)," Memorial #107135514, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/107135514 (accessed May 16, 2018).
